title: A scientist walks into a bar
The physics of quantum materials
abstract: The physical description of all materials is rooted in quantum mechanics, which describes how atoms bond and electrons interact at a fundamental level. Although these quantum effects can in many cases be approximated by a classical description at the macroscopic level, in recent years there has been growing interest in material systems where quantum effects remain manifest over a wider range of energy and length scales. Such quantum materials include superconductors, graphene, topological insulators, Weyl semimetals, quantum spin liquids, and spin ices. Many of them derive their properties from reduced dimensionality, in particular from confinement of electrons to two-dimensional sheets. Moreover, they tend to be materials in which electrons cannot be considered as independent particles but interact strongly and give rise to collective excitations known as quasiparticles. In all cases, however, quantum-mechanical effects fundamentally alter properties of the material. This Review surveys the electronic properties of quantum materials through the prism of the electron wavefunction, and examines how its entanglement and topology give rise to a rich variety of quantum states and phases; these are less classically describable than conventional ordered states also driven by quantum mechanics, such as ferromagnetism.
abstract_cn: 所有材料的物理描述都源于量子力学，量子力学描述了原子如何键合和电子在基本水平上相互作用。尽管在许多情况下，这些量子效应可以通过宏观上的经典描述来近似，但近年来，人们对材料系统的兴趣日益增长，在这些系统中，量子效应仍在更广泛的能量和长度范围内显现。此类量子材料包括超导体，石墨烯，拓扑绝缘体，Weyl半金属，量子自旋液体和自旋冰。他们中的许多人都从减小的尺寸中获得了它们的特性，特别是由于将电子限制在二维片中。而且，它们倾向于是其中电子不能被认为是独立粒子而是强烈相互作用并产生称为准粒子的集体激发的材料。但是，在所有情况下，量子力学效应都会从根本上改变材料的性能。本文通过电子波函数的棱镜来研究量子材料的电子性质，并研究其纠缠和拓扑如何产生多种多样的量子态和相态。与传统的有序状态（由铁磁性等量子力学驱动）相比，它们在传统上不那么可描述。

title: Emergent functions of quantum materials
abstract: Materials can harbour quantum many-body systems, most typically in the form of strongly correlated electrons in solids, that lead to novel and remarkable functions thanks to emergence—collective behaviours that arise from strong interactions among the elements. These include the Mott transition, high-temperature superconductivity, topological superconductivity, colossal magnetoresistance, giant magnetoelectric effect, and topological insulators. These phenomena will probably be crucial for developing the next-generation quantum technologies that will meet the urgent technological demands for achieving a sustainable and safe society. Dissipationless electronics using topological currents and quantum spins, energy harvesting such as photovoltaics and thermoelectrics, and secure quantum computing and communication are the three major fields of applications working towards this goal. Here, we review the basic principles and the current status of the emergent phenomena and functions in materials from the viewpoint of strong correlation and topology.
abstract_cn: 材料可以包含量子多体系统，通常以固体中强相关电子的形式存在，由于元素之间的强相互作用而产生的集体行为会导致新颖而引人注目的功能。这些包括莫特跃迁，高温超导，拓扑超导，巨磁电阻，巨磁电效应和拓扑绝缘体。这些现象对于开发下一代量子技术可能至关重要，该技术将满足实现可持续和安全社会的紧急技术需求。使用拓扑电流和量子自旋的无耗散电子学，诸如光伏和热电学的能量收集以及安全的量子计算和通信是朝着这一目标努力的三个主要应用领域。在这里，我们从强相关性和拓扑学的角度回顾了材料中出现的现象和功能的基本原理和现状。

title: Observation of topological edge states in parity–time-symmetric quantum walks
title_cn: 奇偶时间对称量子游动中拓扑边缘状态的观察
abstract: The study of non-Hermitian systems with parity–time (PT) symmetry is a rapidly developing frontier. Realized in recent experiments, PT-symmetric classical optical systems with balanced gain and loss hold great promise for future applications. Here we report the experimental realization of passive PT-symmetric quantum dynamics for single photons by temporally alternating photon losses in the quantum walk interferometers. The ability to impose PT symmetry allows us to realize and investigate Floquet topological phases driven by PT-symmetric quantum walks. We observe topological edge states between regions with different bulk topological properties and confirm the robustness of these edge states with respect to PT-symmetry-preserving perturbations and PT-symmetry-breaking static disorder. Our results contribute towards the realization of quantum mechanical PT-synthetic devices and suggest exciting possibilities for the exploration of the topological properties of non-Hermitian systems using discrete-time quantum walks.
abstract_cn: 具有奇偶性时间（PT）对称性的非Hermitian系统的研究是一个发展迅速的领域。在最近的实验中实现的，具有对称增益和损耗的PT对称经典光学系统在未来的应用中具有广阔的前景。在这里，我们通过量子步态干涉仪中的时间交替光子损耗，报告了单个光子的无源PT对称量子动力学的实验实现。强加PT对称性的能力使我们能够实现和研究由PT对称量子行走驱动的Floquet拓扑相位。我们观察到具有不同整体拓扑性质的区域之间的拓扑边缘状态，并确认这些边缘状态相对于PT对称性保持扰动和PT对称性破坏静态无序的鲁棒性。我们的研究结果为实现量子力学PT合成装置做出了贡献，并为使用离散时间量子行走探索非赫米特系统的拓扑性质提供了令人兴奋的可能性。

title: Negative permittivity in bubble and stripe phases
title_cn: 气泡和条纹相的介电常数为负
abstract: The physics of itinerant electrons in condensed matter is by and large governed by repulsive Coulomb forces. However, attractive interactions may emerge and prevail in determining the ground state despite the pervasive Coulomb repulsion. A notable example is electron pairing and superconductivity. The interplay of attractive and repulsive interactions may also instigate spontaneous symmetry lowering and clustering of charges in geometric patterns even without net attraction. Both types of attractive interaction triggered physics—pairing and charge ordering—are at play in two-dimensional electron systems exposed to a quantizing magnetic field. The charge ordering has been concluded indirectly from transport behaviour. Here we report the observation of negative permittivity present solely when bubble and stripe phases form. In conjunction with a theoretical model, the negative permittivity provides evidence for the underlying attractive exchange-correlation energy which sufficiently countervails Coulomb repulsion at small distances to enable and mediate charge clustering.
abstract_cn: 在凝聚态中，流动电子的物理很大程度上受排斥的库仑力控制。然而，尽管普遍存在库仑排斥，但在确定基态时可能会出现吸引人的相互作用，并占主导地位。一个显着的例子是电子对和超导性。吸引和排斥相互作用的相互作用也可能导致自发的对称性降低和几何图案中电荷的聚集，即使没有净吸引也是如此。两种类型的有吸引力的相互作用触发了物理配对和电荷排序，它们都在暴露于量化磁场的二维电子系统中发挥作用。收费命令是根据运输行为间接得出的。在这里，我们报告仅在气泡和条纹相形成时才出现负介电常数的现象。负介电常数与理论模型相结合，为潜在的有吸引力的交换相关能量提供了证据，该能量足以抵消小距离处的库仑排斥，从而实现并调节电荷簇。

title: A high-temperature quantum spin liquid with polaron spins
title_cn: 极化子自旋的高温量子自旋液体
abstract: The existence of a quantum spin liquid (QSL) in which quantum fluctuations of spins are sufficiently strong to preclude spin ordering down to zero temperature was originally proposed theoretically more than 40 years ago, but its experimental realization turned out to be very elusive. Here we report on an almost ideal spin liquid state that appears to be realized by atomic-cluster spins on the triangular lattice of a charge-density wave state of 1T-TaS2. In this system, the charge excitations have a well-defined gap of ∼0.3 eV, while nuclear quadrupole resonance and muon-spin-relaxation experiments reveal that the spins show gapless QSL dynamics and no long-range magnetic order at least down to 70 mK. Canonical T2 power-law temperature dependence of the spin relaxation dynamics characteristic of a QSL is observed from 200 K to Tf = 55 K. Below this temperature, we observe a new gapless state with reduced density of spin excitations and high degree of local disorder signifying new quantum spin order emerging from the QSL.
abstract_cn: 理论上已经提出了量子自旋液体（QSL），其中自旋的量子涨落足够强以阻止自旋降到零温度，但理论上却是在40多年前提出的，但事实证明，它的实验性实现非常难以捉摸。在这里，我们报告了一种几乎理想的自旋液体状态，该状态似乎是通过在1T-TaS 2 的电荷密度波状态的三角晶格上的原子簇自旋实现的。在该系统中，电荷激发的间隙明确定义为＆＃8764; 0.3＆＃8201; eV，而核四极共振和μ自旋弛豫实验表明自旋显示出无间隙的QSL动力学并且没有长距离的磁场至少要降到70＆＃8201; mK。 QSL自旋弛豫动力学特性的典型T 2 幂律温度相关性在200＆＃8201; K到T f = 55＆＃8201; K处观察到。在此温度以下，我们观察到一种新的无间隙状态，其自旋激发的密度降低，并且局部无序度很高，这表明从QSL出现了新的量子自旋顺序。

title: Forward and inverse kinetic energy cascades in Jupiter's turbulent weather layer
title_cn: 木星湍流天气层中的正反动能级联
abstract: Jupiter’s turbulent weather layer contains phenomena of many different sizes, from local storms up to the Great Red Spot and banded jets. The global circulation is driven by complex interactions with (as yet uncertain) small-scale processes. We have calculated structure functions and kinetic energy spectral fluxes from Cassini observations over a wide range of length scales in Jupiter’s atmosphere. We found evidence for an inverse cascade of kinetic energy from length scales comparable to the first baroclinic Rossby deformation radius up to the global jet scale, but also a forward cascade of kinetic energy from the deformation radius to smaller scales. This second result disagrees with the traditional picture of Jupiter’s atmospheric dynamics, but has some similarities with mesoscale phenomena in the Earth’s atmosphere and oceans. We conclude that the inverse cascade driving Jupiter’s jets may have a dominant energy source at scales close to the deformation radius, such as baroclinic instability.
abstract_cn: 木星的湍急天气层包含许多不同大小的现象，从局部风暴到大红色斑点和带状喷射。全球循环是由与（尚不确定）小规模过程的复杂相互作用驱动的。我们已经从木星观测到的木星大气中各种长度尺度上的结构函数和动能谱通量进行了计算。我们发现证据表明，与第一斜斜Rossby变形半径直至全球射流尺度相比，长度尺度的动能呈反级联，但从变形半径到较小尺度的动能呈正级联。第二个结果与木星的大气动力学的传统图景不同，但与地球大气和海洋的中尺度现象有一些相似之处。我们得出结论，逆级联驱动木星射流在接近变形半径的尺度上可能具有主要的能源，例如斜压不稳定。
